message.body: HA!
So I was just brushing my teeth and I realized I forgot to thank you for dinner. And I'm actually amazed at how thoughtless that was. So apologies and gratitude aimed in your direction.
oddly enough that doesnt really bother me
In fact I didn't even realize it until you said it, so really you could have gotten away with not even saying anything
But I would have known.
And there are people out there that would take grave offense.
I did feel bad though, which is what prompted it.
for what it is worth, I felt appreciated, and for me that is more important than the words
So this is the part where we discuss how the date went...
It was terrible. I can't believe you made me stay that long. NEVER AGAIN.
huh, no wonder men are always leaving you...
Ouch
lol
O.o
I had a really good time. Conversation was great--haven't had a lot of that lately.
I thought you were really funny, and by funny I mean that you laughed at my jokes
Such a guy thing to say.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=psuRGfAaju4
^ The terribad song I was talking about
Wow. This video is worse.
I never would have imagined that was possible.
This is like hipster embodied in electronic audio-visual form.
I want to hurt it.
"such a guy thing to say" is such a girl thing to say
That was a lame comeback.
not a comeback, truth. and it's late
Excuses.
Did you listen to the terribad song or are you ignoring it?
im trying to
It's actually not that bad
/shudder
The music isn't bad.
The lyrics need to be taken out back and put out of their misery.
The video itself needs to be burned and buried.
yah, I dont think its that bad
couse I could just be delirious from lack of sleep

You would not believe your eyes If ten million fireflies Lit up the world as I fell asleep
'Cause they'd fill the open air And leave teardrops everywhere

'Cause I'd get a thousand hugs From ten thousand lightning bugs As they tried to teach me how to dance
A foxtrot above my head A sock hop beneath my bed A disco ball is just hanging by a thread
it rhymes at least

To ten million fireflies I'm weird 'cause I hate goodbyes I got misty eyes as they said farewell
But I'll know where several are If my dreams get real bizarre 'Cause I saved a few and I keep them in a jar
I kind of want to shake you right now.
But even if you were here, I think I'd be too tired to put forth the effort.
I like that he's all talking about how awesome fireflies are and then says that he's trapped a bunch in a jar to die.
Smooth.
I'd kind of like to be shook at this point
Oh? I don't imagine it's a pleasant experience.
at least it's a form of contact
Hm.
It's something that I don't like to admit
I miss that
Yeah, it's a big deal.
It's so easy to tell myself that I don't need it. That it's not important, and in many ways I am better off
For all that I don't really physically interact with the vast majority of people, I'm completely different with my significant other.
well it's nice to know that you don't sleep with the vast majority of other people
I'm not even talking about sleeping with. =P
j/k
=P
...of course not >.>
You're such a pain in the ass. lol
hmmm....odd. I usually don't hear that until the third date
Oh dear.
Im making toast again then going to bed
What's with you and the toast?
I'm already in bed. <3 having a laptop that I can carry around my apt.
yeah, I dont know whats up w the toast
Ugh.
yuh huh
http://fanisblog.blogspot.com/
What's up with "Fanis", btw? I meant to ask about that last night.
You have 1 post on it? -.-
I don't think that counts as a blog ^_^
it's an old nickname
yeah, I only have one post, and its from 2 years ago
I'm lazy O.o
lol
http://cynicalheretic.livejournal.com/52157.html
I wouldn't really call mine a 'blog' per se. I just write/wrote stuff for my friends' consumption.
I feel like you'd enjoy that post though
as apposed to a blog which is...
Public consumption, imo
so then your journal is not for public consumption
It's unfindable by search engines as far as I know.
So yes, it's intended solely for private consumption by people I link to it
mmk
http://cynicalheretic.livejournal.com/50474.html
A lot of the stuff is lyrics. lol
F/M - F/F
Female / Male, where the female is the main star
Female / Female, where there are two female leads
really? There seem to be a fair number of movies like that
then again, Im not up on the latest blockbusters at any given time
Yeah, that was also written like 2 years ago
There have been more lately
Sunshine Cleaning, Julia & Julia (or w/e) are two that come to mind instantly.
ha, the breakup
Ugh, eventually this moves into not-so-goodness
2006 starts getting really girly and a bit more open than I would let things be today
huh
Possibly offensive as posts were written for an all-female audience
I don't believe I have gotten that far. The breakup was a wonderfully awful movie
Yes
I mention it poorly twice lol
It kinda struck home for me a bit. The whole living with the ex and dating thing
Yeah
I didn't like how it ended
It was so...at ends
Like "hey, we're both miserable now. See ya around."
I didn't get that...I would have preferred that actually
It's been awhile since I saw it. I may be making things up.
to me it was more, oh I remember you...you made my life a living hell for a while, but Im over that now....so it's nice to see you!
As if running into your ex on the street is such a joyous experience
You should stop reading at 2006
Don't worry...Im actually doing real work at the moment
which will happen when I get to work at 10:30am
It just becomes much less worthwhile.
lol
I called out today >.>
For more sleep and because my stomach was feeling weird. And because I have errands to run. Which I should start doing.
wuss
I haven't said this in a long, long time, but.... bite me.
...but I hardly know you
Maybe some other time then. =|
Im just not prepared to move that fast
/rolleyes
heard that before huh
Unfortunately, yes. ^_^
well I was being sardonic
What? You?!
I can't believe it!
I actually have no prob moving fast
Hahahah. Love the title of this one.http://xkcd.com/387/
I feel that I have a pretty good idea of how things should flow at this point, so I try to just go with it and not overthing....too much
Now I'm going to try acting erratically so you'll second-guess all of your ideas.
I am speaking very generally of relationships, not of you in particular
Damn, must rework that plan then.
my plan is to try and not be overly accomidating
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=94bGzWyHbu0 guitar around 3:30
And that is the extent of my conversational Spanish these days.
jejej
+a
No idea what that means.
I also know "hay una fiesta in mis pantalones y todos sono invitados."
thats a good one
lols
I dont suggest using it often though
True.
So Liz, I am glad you are on. There are a few things I would like to say
uh oh
half-empty
one is, I read your post of pessimistic similies of love
Ah
I must say, I LOVED it (couldn't resist)
have a favorite?
probably the mac one
but I like the shorter ones too
So you're a PC? lol
God that movie was depressing.
I am, but that's not the only reason I like it
Yeah, I see some overtones from our conversation last night, ha.
Notably the "All the aesthetics in the world doesn't make up for decreased usability and functionality."
I think the contacts one is my current favorite, as the initial rose one is a bit too pessimistic/sad at this point.
also the phone call at 7am on sat
That one's too bitter for me right now too, lol
Clinging too hard to hope... those just scare me ^_^
hmmmm
and how does that make you feel, Liz?
Which part?
any part
I feel like counceling
I'm mostly feeling tired and lonely, which is making me slightly maudlin. Sleep will make it better. ^_^
It certainly helps with the tired part.
oh, the other thing I wanted to ask you about is your writing.
When I saw that I have only posted one blog, I realized that I really should write more. I enjoy writing, but I am lazy about it and often distracted
Yeah, that's my problem too.
so how do you fix?
Force yourself to make time. It's the only way.
Build time into your schedule/routine for it.
Carry something to write on at all times and write down whatever strikes you.
sounds like a plan
I'm buying an iPad tomorrow
O.o

I just have a small-ish spiral-bound notebook in my purse. But that's why I wouldn't mind getting a small tablet at some point. I do want stylus input built into the UI though--not added on like it is with the iPad.

I suppose you are right about the time thing, but I don't always feel like writing during the time I have alloted for it. Some times I am thinking and I would like to get my thoughs down, but it may not be a good time
Yup. I know how it is. I'm the same way. Allegedly after you get in a routine, it gets easier to automatically write without waiting for the 'perfect' time.
what happens to me is, I'll be driving or the like and I will think of something that I would like to possibly revisit later and I have no way of getting it down
I think a friend of mine either calls herself and leaves VM messages or has some way to record stuff on her phone.
yeah I guess most phones now what the ability
or have
I usually find a way to jot down enough of something to spark my memory later... but that's not exactly the safest way of doing things.
Whichever. ^_^
I am pretty exhausted
It was close to ten by the time I got up though
I just crawled into bed with my laptop.
been here for about an hr
Im shopping for a water heater
Fun. =)
My alarm quite insistently tried to rouse me at 6:30 and 7
I know I haven't had enough sleep when it takes me several minutes to figure out what the noise is.
I ended up getting out of bed around 9:30
and NOT going to work
They give me sick time for a reason.
I get sick like 5 times less than most people I work with.
I feel no guilt.
I should hope not
If I were not so tired, I would try to write something.
I don't know what I would write about at this point because I'm too tired to think.
Well, what kind of stuff do you want to write about when you aren't too tired to think?
I had some stuff earlier that would have made for a half-decent poem or love song, but it's all gone now
Yeah, poetry is fleeting if you don't write it down.
Have you written poetry/songs before?
I feel I can write about anything, the economy for example
But what do you _want_ to write about?
whatever I feel like writing about...god!
lol
Okay.
what I mean is it can be anything. Whatever my mind is fixated on at that given time
Right. But I was asking if there is anything in particular you want to write.
You've seen my journal posts... I typically end up writing about religion/love/social issues
But I _want_ to write fiction. When I think "I want to sit down and write," fiction is what I envision.
So I was looking to see if you had a sense of "direction" similar to that
not me
Well, considering you don't read fiction, I wasn't thinking it'd be fiction. ^_^
I very much want to write about religion/love/social issues
anything really, but stuff that is real
I could write fiction, and have, but I would need to work on that
it doesn't come as naturally to me. I have to really force it, therefore I enjoy it less
Right.
If you take lunch breaks, you could always try jotting stuff down then.
Remember that writing in the electronic realm/"cloud" is impermanent---you can always go back to edit/add/subtract things at a later time.
true, but in my work I can take breaks whenever I want
But my mind is just not there. I am thinking about stuff, but Im in a total work mindset
http://www.myspace.com/fanisd
there are more blog posts on there.
I've just looked at a few, brings back some memories
my myspace posts are almost entirely surveys
I think there is poetry and shit in there, but it's protected
I believe mine is public, but I could be wrong
http://blogs.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=blog.viewcustom&friendId=30754154&blogId=435734587&swapped=true
I just read that one. It's not much but it gets me
"Just Words..." reads a lot like spoken word poetry in some places
ha
"I am neither a fisherman nor a teacher, hence I move on." love it
I wrote that at some ungodly hour just lying in bed. I think I actually woke up and was half asleep when I pieced it together
as I read it, I'm finding all the mistakes in it
Sometimes that's the best time to write... All your consciousness and self-consciousness is shunted away in some gossamer prison.
It's very stream-of-conscious, but you've got some good rhythms in there.
Impressed that you used "whom" correctly.
Since most people don't
it's probably one of my favorite things I have wrote, mainly because of how natural it came out of me
this is good though. Re-reading some of these may be exactly what I need to get into writing again
